summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UrbanPulse AI platform - urban planning intelligence dashboard for Nairobi. All core features working successfully including interactive map, urban indicators, AI insights generation, and data visualization.

fixed_issues.issue: String formatting error in AI context generation causing 500 errors
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added error handling and safe data extraction for indicators context

minor_issues.issue: Close button occasionally intercepted by toast notifications
minor_issues.workaround: Panel can be closed by clicking outside or waiting for toast to disappear

passed_tests: Dashboard loads successfully with all components visible
Urban map renders Nairobi with CartoDB dark tiles and all layers
Layer toggle buttons work correctly (residential, commercial, facilities, roads)
Population density, land use, road density, and green space metrics display correctly
Charts render properly (bar chart for dense zones, pie chart for land use)
Quick stats sidebar shows correct population (800,050), built-up area (11.58%), accessibility (1.66/100)
AI Insights button triggers insight generation successfully
AI Insights panel displays 5 issues and 5 recommendations with proper formatting
Map popup shows zone information on click (e.g., Ngong Road details)
All backend API endpoints return correct data (/api/cities, /api/city/nairobi/data, /api/city/nairobi/indicators, /api/ai/insights)
GPT-5.2 AI integration generates comprehensive urban planning insights
Dark futuristic theme with glassmorphism effects working correctly
Responsive layout with proper sidebar and analytics panel
